channel.title: How do i make dragon claws hit 4 times?

item.title: How do i make dragon claws hit 4 times?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

[quote=“Dopple™, post:18, topic:286384”]K replace that last code i gave you lol with this i forgot to edit for you
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 600, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}[/quote]io still got two errors

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make dragon claws hit 4 times?

location: class client

^
client.java:6587: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable DCDamg
location: class client
DCDamg = true;
^
2 errors

[quote author=Zezerex link=topic=378746.msg2848712#msg2848712 date=1246413674]

Remove the other code i told you to put in
[/quote]and put in the first one you told me to put in?

No remove the first one i told you to put in and you know your code you started this topic with just replace it with

}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}
[/quote]nowi have two errors[/quote]
What are they?

You need to get models and ints first.

item.title: How do i make dragon claws hit 4 times?
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

[quote=“Zezerex, post:1, topic:286384”]the code i have so far is

}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 600, 2068);
npcDamage(8);
}

but it only hits two times…can someone tell me how i can make it hit 3 times?[/quote]

}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAmount -= 50;
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(20) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
dclaws = 3;
}

Read full topic
